item.description:
So I've heard so much from the other members of the group about this place, so here it is! The Blue Room Brunch! The food looks absolutely wonderful! Can't wait to see you all there!!

The brunch is in buffet style and costs $23, not including drinks. A little pricey for some, so please be aware coming into the brunch.
The reservation will be under Marie. I will send out an e-mail with my contact information closer to the event.

I know there is another event on this day, but it's the only day I could do it in June!

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: The Blue Room
